summary: This document is a warranty deed transferring property from GSJ Properties Corp. to Great St. Jim, LLC for the sum of five million dollars. It details the property description and includes references to previous ownership and tax clearance certifications.

persons.name: Kevin F. D'Amour
persons.context: Kevin F. D'Amour is identified as the President of GSJ Properties Corp., signing the warranty deed on behalf of the corporation.

persons.name: Helle Bungaard
persons.context: Helle Bungaard is mentioned as a previous owner of the property conveyed to GSJ Properties Corp. in a prior warranty deed.

persons.name: Steen Bungaard
persons.context: Steen Bungaard is mentioned as a previous owner of the property conveyed to GSJ Properties Corp. in a prior warranty deed.

persons.name: John Knud Forst
persons.context: John Knud Forst is mentioned as a previous owner of the property conveyed to GSJ Properties Corp. in a prior warranty deed.

persons.name: Nina Fürst
persons.context: Nina Fürst is mentioned as a previous owner of the property conveyed to GSJ Properties Corp. in a prior warranty deed.

persons.name: Kim Fürst
persons.context: Kim Fürst is mentioned as a previous owner of the property conveyed to GSJ Properties Corp. in a prior warranty deed.

persons.name: Ludence Romney
persons.context: Ludence Romney is identified as the Tax Collector who certified that there are no outstanding real property tax obligations for GSJ Properties Corp.

persons.name: Delbert Hewitt
persons.context: Delbert Hewitt is identified as the Chief of Staff who certified that there are no outstanding real property tax obligations for the Furst family.

connections.description: Kevin F. D'Amour is the President of GSJ Properties Corp., representing the corporation in the warranty deed.
Helle Bungaard is a previous owner of the property now owned by GSJ Properties Corp.
Steen Bungaard is a previous owner of the property now owned by GSJ Properties Corp.
John Knud Forst is a previous owner of the property now owned by GSJ Properties Corp.
Nina Fürst is a previous owner of the property now owned by GSJ Properties Corp.
Kim Fürst is a previous owner of the property now owned by GSJ Properties Corp.
Ludence Romney is the Tax Collector who certified the tax status of GSJ Properties Corp.
Delbert Hewitt is the Chief of Staff who certified the tax status of the Furst family.

events.title: Property Transfer
events.description: GSJ Properties Corp. transfers property to Great St. Jim, LLC for five million dollars.

events.title: Previous Property Conveyance
events.description: Helle Bungaard and Steen Bungaard convey the property to GSJ Properties Corp.

events.title: Previous Property Conveyance
events.description: John Knud Forst, Nina Fürst, and Kim Fürst convey the property to GSJ Properties Corp.

events.title: Recording of Previous Deed
events.description: The warranty deed from John Knud Forst, Nina Fürst, and Kim Fürst is recorded.

locations: Great St. James Island, St. Thomas, Virgin Islands
5143 Palm Passage, Suites 18B and 1W, St. Thomas, USVI 00802
Royal Palms Professional Building, 9053 Estate Thomas, Suite 101, St. Thomas, VI 00802
keyFacts: The warranty deed was executed on January 2, 2016, transferring property for five million dollars.
The property consists of multiple parcels on Great St. James Island.
Previous owners of the property include Helle Bungaard, Steen Bungaard, John Knud Forst, Nina Fürst, and Kim Fürst.
Ludence Romney certified that there are no outstanding real property tax obligations for GSJ Properties Corp.
Delbert Hewitt certified that there are no outstanding real property tax obligations for the Furst family.
